name: Trash King (lukewarmtarsier, bmoconno)
description:
The Trash King has stolen the Garbage Man's golden garbage! His prized possession!

The Trash King will defend his treasure by throwing trash cans, while the Garbage Man must make the long trek up the hill to recover his lost bag of trash.

As the Trash King:
Press x on the keyboard to throw trash cans.

As the Garbage Man:
Press Left and Right arrow keys to move Left/Right.
Press Up to climb streets.
Press spacebar to jump.
